heading: About
text: R script performs ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) operations GDP data sourced UN Statistics Division. handles preprocessing, data aggregation regions/groups creates comparison plots. pipeline process can broken 3 steps:Data extracted UNSD Taiwan NSO using API.Afterwards, data transformed meets UNCTAD requirements.Lastly, data loaded csv file can uploaded UNCTADstat Data centre.

heading: Gross Domestic Product
text: GDP current prices (nominal GDP) measures value goods services produced economy using prices year, includes effects inflation. contrast, GDP constant prices (real GDP) adjusts inflation using prices base year (2015), reflecting actual change quantity goods services produced. makes real GDP better measure economic growth time.

heading: Libraries
text: R scripts bookdown document require following packages:
code:
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl) 
library(httr)
library(plotly)
library(htmltools)
library(gridExtra)

heading: 1 Usage
text: R Scripts, simply open files RStudio run functions inside order .

heading: R Scripts
text: gdp_etl_pipeline.R Contains one function runs entire ETL pipeline.gdp_etl_plots.R Contains one function generates comparison plots individual economies groups economies. plots exported pdf file.

heading: Working Directory
text: scripts automatically set working directory location active R script file RStudio.

heading: Directories
text: Defines paths :datadir: Data inputoutputdir: Output files

heading: Economy Metadata
text: Files found datadir:Dim_countries.csv: Contains economy codes valid year ranges.Dim_Countries_Hierarchy_All.csv: Contains hierarchical grouping aggregations.lab_all.csv: Contains economy codes labels.GDP growth rates.xlsx: Contains growth rates economies. (needed estimating values last year)US.GDPTotal_20250718_104458.csv Last release GDP dataset UNCTADstat

heading: Output Files
text: Files found outputdir:gdp_comparison.csv: dataset containing old new GDP values.GDP_comparison_groups.pdf: Comparison plots individual economies groups economies.gdp_update.csv: updated dataset generic format.gdp_update_usis.csv: updated dataset specific format used USIS uploading UNCTADstat.

heading: 2 Pipeline Explanation
text: page provides comprehensive explanation GDP data processing R script.

heading: 2.1 Data Processing ETL Pipeline
code:
# Extract 
get_unsd_gdp_data() %>%
  get_taiwan_gdp_data() %>%
  
  # Transform
  compute_missing_values() %>%
  estimate_last_year(skip_estimation=FALSE) %>%
  round_values() %>%
  delete_data_out_of_valid_range() %>%
  add_economy_labels() %>%
  compute_aggregate_values() %>%
  add_comments() %>%
  
  # Load
  export_to_general_csv("gdp_update.csv") %>%
  export_to_usis_csv("gdp_update_usis.csv")

heading: get_unsd_gdp_data()
text: Downloads GDP data using UNSD API (constant current prices).Merges, reshapes, formats dataset.

heading: get_taiwan_gdp_data(df)
text:
Downloads GDP data Taiwan NSO (constant current prices).Rebases GDP constant prices year 2021 2015.Calculates TWD USD exchange rates.
GDP data current prices USD converted TWD using annual period-average exchange rates.
GDP data constant prices USD converted TWD using annual period-average exchange rate base year (2015) years.
GDP data current prices USD converted TWD using annual period-average exchange rates.GDP data constant prices USD converted TWD using annual period-average exchange rate base year (2015) years.

heading: compute_missing_values(df)
text: Handles historical geopolitical inconsistencies merging country records (e.g., Yugoslavia, USSR)Described -depth chapter Special Cases.

heading: estimate_last_year(df, skip_estimation=FALSE)
text: Last year estimated using growth rates found GDP growth rates.xlsx.step skipped, skip_estimation set TRUE

heading: round_values(df)
text: Rounds values nearest integer using base R round() function.

heading: delete_data_out_of_valid_range(df)
text: Filters data points falling outside valid year range country.

heading: compute_aggregate_values(df)
text: Computes GDP aggregates groups using hierarchical mappings.

heading: add_economy_labels(df)
text: Joins human-readable economy labels using economy codes.

heading: add_comments(df)
text: Adds “CommentEN” “CommentFR” columns remarking values calculated compute_missing_values(df).

heading: export_to_generic_csv(df, filename)
text: Saves dataset generic CSV file.

heading: export_to_usis_csv(df, filename)
text: Saves dataset CSV file used USIS upload UNCTADstat.

heading: 3.1 Taiwan Province of China
text: UNSD dataset contain data Taiwan. Taiwan data extracted separately Taiwan’s National Statistical Office.

heading: 3.2 Former economies
text: Three former economies relabeled.

heading: Federal Republic of Germany 1970-1989
text: Federal Republic Germany 280 <- Germany 276

heading: Indonesia (..2002) 1970-2002
text: Indonesia (..2002) 960 <- Indonesia 360

heading: Panama, excluding Canal Zone 1970-1980
text: Panama, excluding Canal Zone 590 <- Panama 591

heading: 3.3 Dissolved Economies
text: Data certain dissolved economies calculated aggregating descendant economies.Example: Czechoslovakia split 1993 Czechia Slovakia. UNCTAD requires data Czechoslovakia 1992 separate data since 1993. UNSD contains Czechoslovakia data 1989 separate data since 1990. ETL script sums Czechia Slovakia data years 1990-1992 adds Czechoslovakia label, economy code 200 comment Czechia 203 + Slovakia 703 referring origin values.full list special cases.

heading: United Republic of Tanzania 1970-2023
text: URT 834 <- Tanzania Mainland 835 + Zanzibar 836

heading: Czechoslovakia (Former) 1990-1992
text: Czechoslovakia 200 <- Czechia 203 + Slovakia 703

heading: Sudan (Former) 2011
text: Former Sudan 736 <- South Sudan 728 + Sudan 729

heading: Serbia and Montenegro 1992-1998
text: Serbia Montenegro 891 <- Serbia 688 + Montenegro 499

heading: Serbia and Montenegro 1999-2007
text: Serbia Montenegro 891 <- Serbia 688 + Montenegro 499 + Kosovo 412

heading: Yugoslavia (Former) 1991
text:
Yugoslavia 890 <- Serbia 688 + Montenegro 499 + Croatia 191 + North Macedonia 807
+ Slovenia 705 + Bosnia Herzegovina 070

heading: USSR (Former) 1991
text:
USSR 810 <- Russian Federation 643 + Ukraine 804 + Belarus 112 + Uzbekistan 860 + Kazakhstan 398
+ Georgia 268 + Azerbaijan 031 + Lithuania 440 + Moldova 498 + Latvia 428 + Kyrgyzstan 417
+ Tajikistan 762 + Armenia 051 + Turkmenistan 795 + Estonia 233
